content: {"locationId": "14425", "organizationId": "11120", "name": "Arms Around BA", "address1": "840 S Elm Place", "address2": "", "city": "Broken Arrow", "state": "OK", "zipCode": "74012", "country": null, "phone": "918-258-7714", "phoneExt": "", "website": "https://www.armsaroundba.org/", "latitude": "36.044418", "longitude": "-95.7976288", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "", "aboutUs": "...A mission with a purpose to meet the physical, emotional and spiritual needs of Broken Arrow, Bixby, and Coweta residents...", "notes": "In order to receive assistance, you must be a resident of Broken Arrow, Bixby or Coweta.  You must bring with you a current Photo ID and current Proof of Residence at each visit.", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, Grocery / Client Choice, Other, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 82, "regionName": "Food Bank of Eastern Oklahoma", "logoBlobNameSmall": "60490bc4-b621-4409-a570-a7ffebd9708e.png", "website": "https://okfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Monday 10:00 AM-3:00 PM ( )", "Monday 6:00 PM-8:00 PM ( )", "Wednesday 10:00 AM-3:00 PM ( )", "Friday 10:00 AM-3:00 PM ( )"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
